docs.title: Welcome to the CasperBot Wiki
docs.text: Use the tabs above to navigate through the docs.

docs.title: Commands
docs.text:
List of available commands:

  • !ping – health check
  • !help – show help menu
  • !roll – roll a die (e.g. 1d20)
